name: International Valuation Standards Council
goal: The IVSC is the global standard setter for valuation practice and the valuation profession. Acting in the public interest, it aims to develop, maintain and promote high quality, globally recognised standards including both the International Valuation Standards and the International Professional Standards.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives:
Capital Markets Union
Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive
Impact of IFRSs in EU
CRD IV
Bank Recovery and Resolution
Mortgage Credit
European Long Term Investment Funds
Solvency II
Company Law Modernisation
